response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly enhance your life or business. Given its rarity and quality, I understand that its true worth might be difficult to quantify without firsthand experience. However, I am confident in its ability to provide substantial returns on investment or unparalleled utility depending on your needs.

Considering the exceptional nature of this product, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value, allowing you to benefit from its unique features without breaking the bank.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information or arrange a viewing so you can appreciate its qualities firsthand.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
